1.content:
Welcome to the Diaper Humiliation Crossover! Where so many will suffer an awful fate!

Today we should start with the media. We will likely give you the option of picking the series, and then you decide how you want things to go! Should it be one main character dealing with this crossover that you’ll focus on? Or a pair of characters you focus on? Or more?!

Or you can do something wild and do a whole crossover story type interactive! The sky’s the limit for humiliation!

So let us begin
1.title: Let Us Begin.

“Piplup piplup.” Her penguin Pokémon tells her.

“Calm down? How can I! Nothing can possibly go wrong today!” She laughs. She then looks down and sees their destination. “Look Piplup, Look! There it is!” She ssid, pointing to...
1111311.title: Dawn in smash....Leads to some humiliating results

1113.content:
You are on the train. When suddenly a feeling comes over you. You need to poop.about 10 muinets later you can’t hold it in any more and a squishy brown log falls into your panties. Many people notice you’ve had an accident as people stare at you. Your panties are stained brown and hanging below you blue skirt. A woman takes your hand and you get of at the next stop. She tells you “don’t be embarrassed it happens to the best of us sweetie.” She then leads you to the baby changing room. You are trying to hold the tears from your eyes.When you get to the changing room she lift you up and puts you on the changing table. Surprisingly you fit due to your small size. You kind of look like a toddler getting a diaper change.when your in there you burst into tears you are then met with a pacifier. “Shhhh”,she said as she pulled of your panties “looks like you had a big accident sweetie”
She wipes you clean and alplies powder she then slid a diaper under your bottom and taped it on you feel much happier then. She takes you out of the room where without notice you start flooding your diaper with pee. “Aww you couldn’t make it to the toilet,” she said you diaper hung well below you skirt humiliating you “don’t worry it can hold more”,she said

113332121.content: Is it Tommy that tries convincing him?
113332121.title: Yes

1133321211.content:
Tommy and Chuckie were playing in the sandbox in Tommy's backyard together. They were having a good time, when all of a sudden, Chuckie had to pee.

"Tommy, I gotta go potty!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Go right ahead, Chuckie. I'll be fine out here." Tommy assured Chuckie. As Tommy wore a diaper, he could use it whenever he had to go potty. Chuckie ran into Tommy's house and made his way to the bathroom. He found his potty sitting next to the toilet, then he pulled down his pants and underwear. He sat on his potty, sighing with relief as he peed in it. He peed until his bladder was empty and his potty was full. When he was all done, he put his pants and underwear back on, then he washed his hands and went back outside. When he got back outside, Tommy noticed him looking unhappy.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"You know, Tommy. You're real lucky. You don't have to worry about going potty." Chuckie told Tommy.

"But Chuckie, I thought you liked being potty-trained." Tommy told Chuckie.

"I do. It's just... I wish I didn't have to stop playing with you so I could use the potty." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Well, Chuckie, if you don't want to stop playing and use the potty, you're always welcome to use one of my diapies. They're soft and comfy, they're easy to take off if you need a change, and bestest of all, if you have to go potty, you don't have to stop playing. You can just go in your diapie and keep playing." Tommy told Chuckie. Chuckie rather liked this idea.

"Okay, Tommy. That does sound like fun. I think I'd like to try it, just for today." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Great! I'll be right back!" said Tommy. He went into his house and made his way to his bedroom, where he found his clean diapers on his changing table. He picked one up, then he made his way back to Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie. I'm back. Let's get this diapie on!" said Tommy. Chuckie pulled down his pants and underwear.

"Okay, Tommy. I'm ready." said Chuckie.

Did Chuckie put his diaper on by himself, or did Tommy help him?
1133321211.title: Sure.

choices: Chuckie Pulls His Pants and Underwear Back Up
Chuckie Takes Off His Pants and Underwear
11333212111.content:
Chuckie decided to put the diaper on by himself. Tommy handed it to him, and he and taped it onto his bottom. He was surprised to see it fit him rather well, not being tight at all.

Once the diaper was on, did Chuckie pull his pants and underwear back up so no one would notice he was now wearing a diaper, or did he decide to take them off so everyone could see his diaper?
11333212111.title: He Put it on Himself

113332121111.content:
Admittedly, Chuckie wasn't fully comfortable with people seeing him wearing a diaper, so he decided to pull his pants and underwear back up so no one would notice. Now that he was wearing a diaper, he felt happy. The diaper felt soft and comfortable, and even though he didn't have to go potty right now since he already peed in his potty, he knew that he could just use his diaper the next time he had to pee or poop.

What happens next?

Did Chuckie explain what had happened, or Tommy?
11333212112222.title: Susie

113332121122222.content:
"Well, Susie, it's like this. Earlier today, I was playin' in the sandbox with Tommy, when all of a sudden, I had to go potty. I went inside the house and used my potty, but I didn't feel happy afterwards. I didn't like havin' to stop playing with Tommy to use the potty, so Tommy offered to get me one of his diapers. I decided, just for today, that I'd wear them and use them if I had to go potty. When Tommy put it on me, I forgetted how soft and comfortable they were." Chuckie told Susie.

How did Susie feel about Chuckie wearing a diaper?
113332121122222.title: Chuckie.

1133321211222221.content: She politely told him he didn't have to wear them.
1133321211222221.title: Reader's Choice 1

11333212112222211.content:
"Chuckie, I understand your feelings, but you're potty-trained now. You can't go back to wearing diapers." Susie told Chuckie.

"Why not?" Chuckie asked Susie.

"Well, if you want to be a big kid like me, you gotta keep going forward. You can't spend the rest of your life being held back by baby things like wearing diapers. Once you're potty-trained, you don't have to worry about being dirty or wet or having to wait for someone to change you. You can just use your potty whenever you have to pee or poop. Sure, before I came here, I wasn't sure I wanted to be potty-trained, either, especially when my mommy, daddy, brothers and sister all watched me, but once I started using my potty, I was glad to be wearing big-girl underwear, and now I don't ever want to go back to wearing diapers. What's more, once you get good at using the potty, the growed-ups stop watching you, so it'll be much easier." Susie told Chuckie.

Did Susie's speech inspire Chuckie to take off his diaper and go back to being potty-trained?
11333212112222211.title: Yeah.

11333212112222213.content: Did Susie tell Chuckie that Angelica might tease him if she saw him wearing a diaper?
11333212112222213.title: Anything else.

choices: Take Off His Diaper and Put His Pants and Underwear Back On

"What do you mean?" Chuckie asked Susie.

"Well, what if Angelica sees you wearing that diaper? She's never gotta let you live it down!" Susie told Chuckie.

"Gee, I never thinked about that afore." said Chuckie.

11333212112222213111.content:
Chuckie untaped his diaper, which was still dry, and let it fall to the ground. Once it was off, Chuckie picked up his pants and underwear and put them back on. Chuckie picked up his diaper and walked up to Tommy.

"You know, Tommy, wearing this diaper was fun, but I think I'm ready to go back to bein' potty-trained now." Chuckie said to Tommy.

"Okay, Chuckie." said Tommy. Tommy still preferred to wear diapers, but was fully supportive of Chuckie's decision to be potty-trained. Likewise, Chuckie was fully supportive of Tommy's decision to keep wearing diapers even though he preferred to be potty-trained.

"Here, Tommy. You can have your diaper back. You need it more than I do." Chuckie told Tommy as he handed him his diaper.

"Thanks, Chuckie." said Tommy.

What happens next?
11333212112222213111.title: Yeah.

"You'd do that for me?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

11333222311.title: Yeah.

113332223112.content: That Angelica could be nice to the babies.
113332223112.title: Reader's Choice 2

1133322231121.content:
The day before, Susie and Angelica made a bet. If Angelica could be nice to the babies for just one day, Susie would wear a diaper. However, if Angelica was mean to the babies during the bet, she would have to wear a diaper. To the shock of both Susie and the babies, Angelica was able to be nice to the latter for just one day. Having to be nice to the babies wasn't easy for Angelica, as many times, she wanted to call them "dumb babies" or yell at them, but it was worth it to have won the bet and see Susie in a diaper.

"Well, Angelica, I can't believe it, but you did it. You actually managed to be nice to the babies for a single day." Susie said to Angelica.

"Told you I could do it." Angelica said to Susie.

"I guess I underestimated you." Susie said to Angelica.

"That's right. Now, you remember our deal, Susie. Since I won the bet, you have to wear a diaper." Angelica told Susie, who sighed unhappily.

"Okay, Angelica. A deal's a deal. Let's get this over with." said Susie unhappily.

Who gets Susie a clean diaper to wear?
1133322231121.title: Yup.

115211.content: How does Dennis end up being put in a diaper?
115211.title: Dennis Mitchell

1152111.content: Is it Margaret who dresses him as a baby?
1152111.title: He is Forced to Be Dressed Like a Baby

11521111.content:
Both Henry and Alice had to work, and they had trouble getting any babysitters to look after Dennis a second time, so Dennis had to spend the day at Margaret Wade's house. Dennis didn't like Margaret because she had an obvious crush on him and often made him play house with her whenever he visited. Margaret often wandered around pushing a baby doll in a baby carriage. The last time Dennis visited Margaret's house, he tied Margaret's doll to a rocket and sent it into space to get out of playing house with her, and the doll got damaged as a result. Fortunately for Dennis, his parents didn't find out about this. Until Margaret got a new doll, she needed something to be her baby, and since Dennis was the one who got her doll damaged, she decided that he would have to be her baby to make up for it.

"Well, Dennis, if you're going to be my baby, you're going to have to look like a baby." said Margaret.

"What are you getting at?" Dennis asked Margaret.

"Now hold still while I change your diaper." Margaret said as she held out a cloth diaper in one hand and a pair of safety pins in the other.

"No way am I wearing a diaper!" said Dennis.

"Do you want me to tell your parents about how you destroyed my favorite doll?" Margaret asked Dennis.

Does Dennis let Margaret put a diaper on him?
11521111.title: Yes

115211111.content: He laid on the floor, knowing he couldn't talk his way out of this one, and she began. Had she forgotten to use baby powder, though?
115211111.title: Yes

1152111112.content:
Soon Dennis was powdered and diapered, and he did not like it one bit.

After she diapered him, what did Margaret do to Dennis?
1152111112.title: Nah.

1152111112112.content: He kept turning his head, so she missed, but, did he manage to trick her into eating them?
1152111112112.title: No, He Turned His Head to Avoid the Spoon

info.brief_description: An interactive for crossovers of fictional series based mostly around diaper humiliation.
info.description:
Crossovers between fictional series featuring diaper humiliation. Every character can go around and meet someone from another series, but may be surprised when they find themselves humiliated by that character, humiliated with that character, or escaping humiliation from that character.... ONLY TO BE HUMILIATED BY SOMETHING ELSE!

You will follow them and find ways to put them in such a situation. Heck maybe you don’t even need it to be one character, but pairs of groups! Imagine!

Lots of things can happen here! Imagine Naruto (Naruto) being humiliated by Luffy (one piece), or Usagi (Sailor Moon) and Sakura (Carr Capturer Sakura) being forced into diapers by Samuel Aran(Metroid)! The possibilities are endless!

However I must place my own personal rules here:

1: Fictional media only and no live action stuff, therefore nothing featuring characters that are mostly from live action priorities. This also means no real world people. I will excuse things like comic book movies seeing that they are remembered in comic books and animated series before live action, just try not to use the live action continuity.

2: Some fetishes not allowed: Gore, excessive weight gain(belly may grow but not so big), Muscle growth(unless the series uses it already like dragon ball, but don’t add on to it), TF, and excessive farting(scat is fine tho).

3: OCs were be fine in small to large enough roles. Such as store clerks or being the antagonist (like a bully for example). There will be no oc main character roles AT THIS MOMENT! Like no OC friend we didn’t know about till now, no OC hero who stronger then everyone and is a nicer person anyway. At this moment there will be no OC main characters unless there is enough demand. If you got ideas or questions please message me.

4: Try to fill in enough to make it considered a chapter. I guess a decent starting point for now would be a 100 words unless this is a choice chapter.... That said...
4.5: Please be limited on choice chapters. As I don’t want to see an endless line of choice chapters in the updates unless there is a story at the end. (With things starting you are fine to fill in a few more choice chapters if you wish.)

5: Only other limit is to limit harassment of other creator and to have decent grammar. I have the right to delete chapters, but I likely will warn you unless I think you are trolling or something.
And I’ll say this, with all characters being fictional, sexual themes is fine, all ages can ages above 5 can participant(if they aren’t doing sexual stuff, all ages are fine then), and you all have fun!
